title.narrative: Apoyo a la Consolidación del Sector Salud y de la Seguridad Social II
N/A
N/A
Support for Health Sector and Social Security Consolidation II

description.narrative: Esta es la segunda y última de una serie programática de dos operaciones, cuyoobjetivo general es consolidar progresivamente la cobertura de la seguridad social y mejorar la eficiencia del gasto en salud, mediante la profundización de la reforma que viene implementando el Gobierno de República Dominicana(GORD) en ambos sectores.

This is the second and last in a programmatic series of two operations with the overall objective of progressively consolidating social security coverage and improving health spending efficiency by deepening the reform being implemented by the Government of the Dominican Republic in the two sectors.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2015
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2016
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2017
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2018
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in fourth quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2017
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2018
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in second quarter of 2021
